src:
Manchester United Mungkin Memang Alergi Pujian
03 Nov 2019, 08:30 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Manchester United menelan kekalahan pahit dalam lawatan ke kandang Bournemouth, Sabtu (2/11/2019) malam WIB. Pasukan Ole Gunnar Solskjaer ini menyerah dengan skor 0-1.
Kekalahan ini kembali menegaskan satu masalah Setan Merah musim ini. Mereka tidak bisa menjaga konsistensi performa dari laga ke laga. Padahal MU sedang melangkah dalam tren positif.
Mereka berhasil memetik tiga kemenangan tandang beruntung di semua kompetisi, torehan apik yang kemudian terhenti di hadapan Bournemouth. Tentu, Solskjaer harus segera mencari solusi.
Mengapa demikian? Baca ulasan selengkapnya di bawah ini ya, Bolaneters!
text:
Manchester United may indeed be an allergy of praise
03 Nov 2019, 08:30 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Manchester United swallowed a bitter defeat on a trip to Bournemouth at home on Saturday (11/02/2019) evening hrs. Ole Gunnar Solskjaer's troops surrendered with a score of 0-1.
This defeat again confirms one problem of the Red Devils this season. They cannot maintain consistency in performance from match to match. Though MU is stepping in a positive trend.
They managed to win three lucky away wins in all competitions, a neat nick which then stopped in front of Bournemouth. Of course, Solskjaer must immediately find a solution.
Why is that? Read the full review below, Bolaneters!
